unnormalised: Crop insurance, a must, no? Lost my entire bajra crop in '22 monsoon. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) is good. Is it really worth the hassle, guys? Registration dates are nearing, gotta check ASAP. Need to protect ourselves from unpredictable weather, especially in Maharashtra. Last time, payout was so slow, felt like waiting till 15/08/2023! Anyone filed a claim recently? What was your experience like? Share tips, please! Deadline is 30/06/2024, 17:00 hrs! Thinking of visiting the Krishi Seva Kendra by 10:00 hrs tomorrow. Rs. 5000/acre seems steep though.
normalised: Crop insurance, a must, no? Lost my entire bajra crop in two thousand and twenty two monsoon. Heard Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (P M F B Y) is good. Is it really worth the hassle, guys? Registration dates are nearing, gotta check A S A P. Need to protect ourselves from unpredictable weather, especially in Maharashtra. Last time, payout was so slow, felt like waiting till fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three! Anyone filed a claim recently? What was your experience like? Share tips, please! Deadline is thirtieth june two thousand and twenty four, five P M! Thinking of visiting the Krishi Seva Kendra by ten A M tomorrow. Rupee five thousand per acre seems steep though.
